location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Crommelin, William Hornby, William Andrew Price, Charles Waters, Cecil Bowyer, and Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Council at Bombay Castle, to Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter covers a shipment of sundry goods aboard the Londonand gives instructions as to how to transport items for Bussora [Basra] from Bushire. Also asks whether a surplus of scarlet Worsters [Worcesters] at Bombay will sell at Bushire.
